column5: This cozy, German-style fachwerk cottage has a large living area and three bedrooms - enough space for an occupancy of 10 people.  A cheerful kitchen nook has all the convenience you will need for preparing foods and entertaining.  It's only a short walk from Oma Seidel's Haus to the Blastenhoff and Surfenburg section of Schlitterbahn.
column8: Cozy, German-Style Fachwerk Cottage - Omas Seidel Haus
